001package edu.cnm.deepdive.leavemealone.model;
002
003import edu.cnm.deepdive.leavemealone.model.pojo.GPSCoord;
004import java.net.URI;
005import java.time.Instant;
006import java.util.List;
007
008public class Alert {
009
010  private boolean triggered;
011  private URI photo; // TODO: 2/15/2024 List of photos? Video? 
012  private final Instant timeOn;
013  private  Instant timeOff;
014
015  private List<GPSCoord> coordList;
016
017  // TODO: 2/15/2024 Need field for initial value of the sensors 
018
019  private Alert(Instant timeOn) {
020    this.timeOn = timeOn;
021    triggered = false;
022    photo = null;
023    timeOff = null;
024    // TODO: 2/15/2024 Initialize the sensors 
025  }
026
027
028
029  public void disarm() {
030    setTimeOff(Instant.now());
031    // TODO: 2/12/2024 Add method to disarm alarm
032  }
033
034  public void setTimeOff(Instant timeOff) {
035    this.timeOff = timeOff;
036  }
037}
